name: fileRead
description: Reads an on-disk or in-memory text file or a file object created with the FileOpen function.

params.name: filePath
params.description: An absolute file path, or file object.

params.name: charset
params.description: Character encoding used to read the file.

params.name: bufferSize
params.description: The number of characters to read.

examples.title: Read a file into a variable
examples.description: Uses expandPath to grab a file in current directory.
